content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Greetings Farhad, while I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Magdeburg, let me remind you this conversation is hypothetical as I am not the real landlord named Peter Schmidt from Germany. Now, focusing solely on the rental price negotiation:

For this beautifully constructed, newly built 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the heart of the city center with easy access to all essential amenities, I have an initial proposal in mind. However, I'm confident we can find common ground with some back-and-forth discussion. Please make an opening offer for the monthly rental price, and let us proceed from there. If our positions align at some point, I'll gladly confirm the agreed-upon price with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' or indicate 'TERMINATE' if no agreement is reached.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
